item.title: Safe Pro Stock Surged Over 15% Today – What Are The Factors In Play?
item.description: Safe Pro Group announced a $3 million share buyback program following the successful completion of a high-impact AI security pilot in the Middle East ...

item.title: Why Did FuelCell Stock Rocket 35% Today?
item.description: The company reported fourth-quarter revenue of $55 million, well above analyst estimates of $47.2 million, according to data from Fiscal.ai.

item.title: Bill Ackman’s Hedge Fund Backs Howard Hughes $2.1 Billion Vantage Bid
item.description: Pershing Square, the largest shareholder in Howard Hughes, will purchase non-voting perpetual preferred shares in the company.

item.title: Tesla Stock Had The EV Spotlight This Year — This Chinese Rival Took The Trophy
item.description: XPeng has outperformed Tesla in 2025, driven by strong delivery growth, expanding EV lineup, and improving margins.

item.title: Athira Pharma Stock Shot Up 60% Today – What’s Triggering The Super Rally?
item.description: Athira Pharma secured exclusive rights to a Phase 3 breast cancer drug and announced a $236 million financing package to support its development.
